items.content_html:
This version contains photographic material, proposed with Kevin Burns technique. It is freely playable but access to the nude scenes will only be possible after following the activation procedure for the full version of the game.
 
Here is a demo clip and the link to download the game.
 
If you need support to activate the full version write me and find my references on the contact page.
 
DOWNLOAD RED ROSE STRIP POKER WITH LUCREZIA FOR WINDOWS AND LINUX
 

DOWNLOAD RED ROSE STRIP POKER WITH LUCREZIA FOR WINDOWS AND LINUX

items.title: Red Rose Strip Poker gives Real Emotions
items.summary: Red Rose Strip Poker is based on the open source Kiss Strip Game Engine project and fully embraces the philosophy with which this engine tries to provide a strip themed video game capable of giving emotions. The clips are organized according to the emotional situations…
items.content_html:
Red Rose Strip Poker is based on the open source Kiss Strip Game Engine project and fully embraces the philosophy with which this engine tries to provide a strip themed video game capable of giving emotions. The clips are organized according to the emotional situations described below and to have the maximum longevity for each type of situation multiple shots or clips are made which will then be proposed randomly during gameplay,making each game unique and unrepeatable:
 
CAR abbreviation of CARDS the situation in which the model starts a new hand of poker and then shuffles or distributes the playing cards
 
 
ACT the situation in which the model is intent on the normal course of the poker hand, generally with the five cards in hand, she will look at the cards with more or less fun, sexy or provocative or curious ... creativity has no limits
 
 
WIN the situation in which the model has won the hand, so she will generally show smiling, amused but also winking or making fun, or breathing a sigh of relief, the imagination has no limits as well as spontaneity
 
 
LOS abbreviation of LOSE, that is the situation in which the model has lost her hand in poker and therefore will generally show herself disappointed, angry, worried ... .. even here spontaneity and imagination are fundamental components
 
 
RIS abbreviation of RISK, the situation in which the model is playing a hand of poker full of tension because it is "risky" in the sense that in case of further defeat she will have to remove a garment. These clips should perhaps be the ones that convey the most evident and conflicting emotions, for example the model could convey the tension given by not wanting to absolutely lose this hand of poker and therefore she can also show her concern or embarrassment, perhaps taking time but why not he could also try to distract the opponent with winks or try to make him uncomfortable by showing himself extremely sure of herself, it all depends on how you want to play the part, on the attitude of the model; conflicting emotions are welcome. Obviously these emotions will be barely hinted at at the beginning and growing with the passage of the removed clothing.
 
 
OFF the situation in which the model has lost the poker hand and therefore she has to remove a garment. Generally the first clothes removed could be accessories (for example one or two jewels, the belt, hair tie, glasses etc.), the way to do it will be simply playful, but clearly with the continuation of the game things will change and here based on the attitude of the model, emphasis will be given, for example, to moving slowly, to slowly and carefully remove clothing or to undo the buttons of a garment slowly as if they were petals of a flower or even why not hesitating a few seconds in indecision which garment to remove or acting with anger or embarrassment or on the contrary provoking with maximum sensuality and later still using glamorous techniques such as hand bra rather than covering up with poker cards, thus asking to play an extra poker hand ... here all the art of the model and the photographer / video maker comes into play.
 
also there are two other types of clips that however do not concern the gameplay but simply the introduction scenes to the game and the final scenes:
 
ENT abbreviation of ENTER the situation in which the game begins the model shows up showing her outfit or walking around the location with a smile and why not a joke
 
END the situation in which the model has lost the game by remaining naked and therefore based on her attitude and art she will elegantly show all her beauty by posing freely.

items.title: A wonderful way to immortal beauty and make it eternal
items.summary: Photography already has this wonderful power, just like many forms of art such as painting, sculpture but also literature and many others ... If we want to understand a video game as a work of art, I think that the latter in turn has nothing…
items.content_html:
Photography already has this wonderful power, just like many forms of art such as painting, sculpture but also literature and many others ...
 
If we want to understand a video game as a work of art, I think that the latter in turn has nothing less and indeed, is able to include many of the art forms listed above .. so why not?
 
And if the idea is that of strip poker, taking advantage of the situation as a starting point to range from various genres such as glamor, portraiture, artistic nude but why not also fashion, still life or other ...
 
Let's imagine that we have produced the video game, so that we have worked in perfect synergy with a beautiful model, taking all the shots and clips with the utmost care, having assembled everything taking care of every detail with the aim of creating a work of art. The result will be something beautiful both for a gamer who is passionate about games of this type, and for those who love photography and feminine beauty, beautiful and elegant first of all for the photographer and the model who have created something unique by giving vent to the own art and with the possibility of even being able to monetize.
 
Let's spend 20-30 years ... let's play this old video game and try to imagine what emotions it will give us ... yes, all this is a wonderful way to immortalize beauty and make it eternal ...

items.title: Disclaimer
items.summary: All rights reserved by Nicolas Arti. Any complete, partial or altered reproduction of texts, logos, photos, video clips is prohibited without the prior written authorization of the author Nicolas Arti. These pages contain nude images which, despite having an intention and an artistic value, depict…
items.content_html:
All rights reserved by Nicolas Arti. Any complete, partial or altered reproduction of texts, logos, photos, video clips is prohibited without the prior written authorization of the author Nicolas Arti.
 
These pages contain nude images which, despite having an intention and an artistic value, depict the naked adult human body. If you are under the legal age to observe material of this kind or if nudity offends you, please leave this site.
 
The photographs depicting models and models were taken during organized shootings and with the consent of the photographed subjects who have issued a specific written release declaration.
 
All models portrayed on this site were at least 18 years old at the time of shooting.
 
This site contains links to other websites that are not under the control of Nicolas Arti. The publication of these links on this site does not imply approval or endorsement of their contents, nor does it imply any form of guarantee. Therefore Nicolas Arti does not assume any responsibility for links to other Internet sites and / or for the contents present in these sites.
 
Some sections of the site may contain images or video clips taken from the internet and / or linked to external sites. If anyone recognizes their own material, with copyright or image rights and / or does not want to see it published on this site, they can at any time request that it be removed by writing to nicolas.bellearti@gmail.com
 
By accessing this site or part of it I accept the conditions and declare the following:
I don't find adult nude images offensive.
I am at least 18 years old.
By connecting to the free site, the provider, the owner and the creators of the site from any direct or indirect liability that may derive from it.

items.title: The Idea
items.summary: Nicolas Bellearti's idea was born in 2013 initially as a simple photographic project, simple card / strip poker themed shoots designed to artistically emphasize the situation, ranging in a natural and playful way between fashion, portrait, glamor and artistic nude genres and is based on…
items.content_html:
Nicolas Bellearti's idea was born in 2013 initially as a simple photographic project, simple card / strip poker themed shoots designed to artistically emphasize the situation, ranging in a natural and playful way between fashion, portrait, glamor and artistic nude genres and is based on some famous photographs and paintings with clear references to the game of strip poker, mostly dating back to the fifties / sixties:

the models portrayed in these works convey a great playfulness as well as other strong contrasting emotions such as innocence, sometimes even embarrassment; mixed with the desire to provoke, wink and transgress by exhibiting one's beauty, simply with a mischievous look or smile as well as showing one's body, or part of it, or perhaps hiding, even modestly, nudity with typically glamorous techniques such as for example hand-bra all in a beautiful crescendo of contrasting emotions.
 
Another aspect that inspired the work of Nicolas Bellearti later, in 2020 and at closing the circle, are strip poker themed video games, nowadays there are many and with high resolution videos / images, but which at least Nicolas Bellearti's opinion has nothing to do with art; so much so that perhaps the products with a minimum of artistic content were the very first video games of this type dating back to the 80s, such as Samantha Fox Strip Poker https://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samantha_Fox_Strip_Poker, released for the legendary Commodore 64:
The fact that the graphics were produced on such a limited machine made it a certain charm, somehow made the imagination work and somehow with Red Rose Strip Poker we want to merge the artistic aspect of the strip poker theme, of nude photography / glamor and wanting to self-produce a video game nowadays in ways that are partly comparable to what happened in the 80's. Red Rose Strip Poker looks to the future but with a retrospective perspective.
 
The result is what you can see and wants to try to stand out and be considered a real new genre, it can foresee the nude, sometimes even integral and explicit, but this is never an end in itself, everything that revolves around counts. naked in an artistic way, the way of posing one's body by posing and using glamorous techniques, feeling the story, feeling the situation and making it one's own by transmitting true emotions.

items.title: FAQ
items.summary: Red Rose Strip Poker the first Strip Poker themed video game designed to be a work of art 100% open source and independent software. Compatible with Windows and Linux PCs. Born with the idea of ​​providing a useful tool for photographers, video makers and models…
items.content_html:
Red Rose Strip Poker
 
the first Strip Poker themed video game designed to be a work of art
 
100% open source and independent software. Compatible with Windows and Linux PCs.
 
Born with the idea of ​​providing a useful tool for photographers, video makers and models to be able to express their art and monetize by creating a customized Strip Poker themed video game, protecting their work and their privacy.
 
Maximum confidentiality and the ability to monetize: the contents are encrypted, in addition the author can distribute the game so that an activation key is requested when starting and / or when a certain stage is reached. The activation key will work only on that pc.
 
It is not necessary to install anything to play, just download the archive and unpack it in a folder of your choice which can therefore also be an external hard disk or SSD.
 
Opportunity to monetize: maximum flexibility, any activation key to unlock the game can be provided after receiving payment through any online or non-online tool. For the maximum protection of privacy or to divide the proceeds among several people, cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin can also be used. A simple bitcoin payment checker is already included in Red Rose Strip Poker.
 
Smart contracts: for maximum privacy and transparency, always taking advantage of cryptocurrencies, a smart contract can also be created to automatically distribute earnings to both the photographer and the model.
 
FAQ:
 
what is Red Rose Strip Poker? it is an opensource video game, developed independently and based on other opensource projects. You can find the source code here https://github.com/nicolasarti/Red-Rose-Strip-Poker You are free to reuse and modify the source code to create your own strip poker themed video game. I only ask that you do not re-use the Red Rose Strip Poker name and / or the graphics and / or multimedia content published by me.
 
How does Red Rose Strip Poker stand out from other similar video games?
first of all it is not a commercial product and the source code is open and available on github for modification and improvement.
In addition to this, from the gamer's point of view, it is a light video game that takes up few resources, it can work without problems even on dated PCs or on a VM, it does not have any kind of bloatware. Yet the graphics are not so bad and the contents can be of very high quality (eg 4K resolution). The multimedia contents with which Red Rose Strip Poker is produced are assembled trying to provide a work of art trying to look to the future with a retrospective eye towards the first strip poker themed video games of the 80s.
 
How can I create my own video game? A step by step guide will be posted on this site soon.
 
I am a model/photographer, how can I monetize once I have created the customized video game with my shots / clips? In a thousand ways. For example, you can agree with the photographer to divide the earnings for each copy sold. To do this, I strongly recommend using Bitcoin or other similar cryptocurrencies.  Why? Because it is the only 100% transparent method; Although bitcoin transactions are anonymous, they are public, knowing the address of the wallet on which monitoring is active it will be possible to monitor in real time how many copies of the game have been sold. If you have agreed to divide the earnings by 50%, it will be possible to verify that the earnings have been divided correctly. Furthermore, using a smart contract no manual actions will be necessary, for example when a certain amount is reached, the content of the game wallet is automatically divided into the percentages agreed at the time of creating the smart contract, on the photographer's wallet and on the model's wallet. Who will then be able to decide individually whether to accumulate cryptocurrency, spend or have everything converted into euros. Nobody forbids the models to be able to produce the video game in a totally self-produced way and therefore monetize 100% of the profits. How? By self-producing the images / clips, the result will obviously be more amateurish but it could still have a following.
 
What is a smart contract? it is simply a software that runs in the cloud whose execution and whose results are guaranteed intact by a public blockchain. In practice, the proceeds will be automatically forwarded to the wallets of the photographer and model. A smart contract of this type does not require that any contract be signed or any personal data exchanged. It is sufficient for the parties to provide their respective public addresses (public key) of the bitcoin wallet. Some easy-to-use wallets are the Conio and Coinbase apps, even the Hype rechargeable card app allows you to hold and / or change bitcoins into euros or vice versa and therefore to be able to spend them with maximum flexibility. There are many other wallets / services used for this purpose.
 
I am a model or a photographer, I have the multimedia material ready for the game but I am not a programmer and I cannot produce my own version of the video game. How can I do? I can help you or I can produce the game for you. I will only ask you for a small percentage of the proceeds from your game and I will be happy to cooperate.
 
I am a model/photographer; i created my game now how do i distribute and monetize it? You can distribute it as you want, for example by uploading it to dropbox, google drive and similar services and then using any platform such as social, ebay or other to promote it. An easy way to monetize is to set the request for the activation key (which can be at the start of the game and / or upon reaching a certain level), after which you can request for monetization via bitcoin, paypal, onlyfans, ecc...  theoretically whatever you want, and send the activation key via email. Bitcoin is only needed to divide the proceeds and / or to have maximum privacy.
 
I downloaded the game but my antivirus tells me it might be malware, what does that mean? Red Rose Strip Poker does not contain malware, the source code is public, some antivirus often detect self-produced software as potential malware and therefore not very widespread. Inquire with the antivirus support to report a false positive and you will see that in the end you will be confirmed to be free from viruses! The more these video games spread, the more the problem will disappear!
 
I have an Apple Mac but I see it is not supported, can't I play? Mac systems are not supported today but you can use virtualization software such as Parallels, vmware workstation or virtualbox that allow you to install Windows or Linux within the mac os operating system.
 
I would like to play from my smartphone or tablet, is it possible? To date it is not possible and there is no version for smartphone or tablet
 
I would like to play via web browser is it possible? No there is no web based version.
 
What can I do to play this video game while maintaining privacy? No data is ever collected by Red Rose Strip Poker, furthermore you can use bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies because they will not leave traces on your bank statement, furthermore you are free to keep the game on an external encrypted device or to play it inside a virtual machine using for example vmware or virtulbox.
 
I downloaded and played the demo version, I saw that there are no underwear or nude scenes, is there a version where the nude is also included? No, the demo version being such, distributed for free and freely playable, does not include intimate / nude scenes, try the other complete versions with other models that will be published.
 
I bought the game but once I changed my pc it stopped working, what can I do? This is normal behavior, when you activate the game, activation is intended on that single PC. If you want to use it on another PC you need to do another activation. You will only have to follow the instructions on the screen, if you have kept the activation key you will not need to purchase the game again.
 
I am a model an I want to take part of Red Rose Strip Poker, way I work with you? I will be glad, check my contact page
 
I need support, what can I do? check my contact page; I answer everyone even if I do not guarantee quick answers, we are talking about amateur / self-produced software and not a commercial product, there is no guarantee and I cannot be held responsible for any problem generated by Red Rose Strip Poker.

This version contains both photographic material, proposed with Kevin Burns technique and video clips proposed with stop-motion technique. It is freely playable but access to the nude scenes will only be possible after following the activation procedure for the full version of the game.
 
Here is a demo clip and the link to download the game.
 
If you need support to activate the full version write me and find my references on the contact page.

items.title: Red Rose Strip Poker Demo
items.summary: Red Rose Strip Poker the first Strip Poker themed video game designed to be a work of art. 100% open source and independent software. Compatible with Windows and Linux PCs. It was born with the idea of ​​providing a useful tool for photographers, videomakers and…
items.content_html:
Red Rose Strip Poker the first Strip Poker themed video game designed to be a work of art.
100% open source and independent software.
Compatible with Windows and Linux PCs.
It was born with the idea of ​​providing a useful tool for photographers, videomakers and models to be able to express their art and monetize by creating a customized Strip Poker themed video game, protecting their work and their privacy. This free, freely playable demo version that does not include underwear or nudity is inspired by old strip poker-themed video games from the 1980s and early 1990s, but the game engine is capable of playing clips and images up to 4k resolution. Above a demo clip and the link to download the playable demo.
 
DOWNLOAD RED ROSE STRIP POKER DEMO

items.title: Red Rose Strip Poker
items.summary: Red Rose Strip Poker is the first Strip Poker themed video game designed to be a work of art. 100% open source software, independent and entirely conceived and produced by Nicolas Bellearti. unique features: • designed to amaze the player by enhancing the crescendo of…
items.content_html:
Red Rose Strip Poker is the first Strip Poker themed video game designed to be a work of art. 100% open source software, independent and entirely conceived and produced by Nicolas Bellearti.
unique features:
• designed to amaze the player by enhancing the crescendo of emotions given by playing with an handsome model

great longevity, the gameplay is never repetitive thanks to the many scenes present and proposed randomly, each game is unique in every phase.

model actions and expressions  will be in line with the various game situations in an unforgettable and realistic crescendo of emotions

• Can include photos and/or videoclips of any kind/quality/resolution
• the Red Rose Strip Poker game engine is also a useful tool for photographers, videomakers and models to be able to express their art and monetize by creating a customized Strip Poker themed video game, protecting their work and privacy, dividing the gains with maximum transparency.
• Potentially integrable with any payment system, already integrated with bitcoin.
